replies.msg:
just to give you the source
https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/news/2021/02/canada-launches-hong-kong-pathway-that-will-attract-recent-graduates-and-skilled-workers-with-faster-permanent-residency.html

"In addition to open work permits, the Government of Canada continues to implement 2 other pathways to permanent residence for young Hong Kong residents, which will be available later this year. The first will be for Hong Kong residents with at least 1 year of work experience in Canada and who meet the language and education criteria. The second will be for Hong Kong residents who have graduated from a post-secondary institution in Canada; who can then apply directly for permanent residence. More information will be available in due course."

replies.msg:
其實佢話
"The second will be for Hong Kong residents who have graduated from a post-secondary institution in Canada; who can then apply directly for permanent residence. More information will be available in due course."

我覺得係指唔洗working experience就可以直報個PR pathway, 有D似PNP postgraduate stream咁, 你一grad就可以apply, 唔洗job offer同working experience. 但問題係現成o個D無咁著數, BCPNP有限科目, OINP就有限大學& degree level, 同埋兩者都有quota. 所以有咁o既質疑其實係好合理.
當然, 大家都係估估下, more information will be available soon la. 不過唔好張全部雞蛋放晒一個籃到, 絕對應該考慮埋worst case. 萬一佢好似澳洲咁真係有後著, 而你又冇backup plan就喊都無謂.
2023 年先U grad，係咪呢世無機會去加拿大
